string_to_speak: Three girls went to a picnic with their elders. They all decided to go for walk into a garden that had cherry trees around. The girls were so happy to see those cherries. They however had difficulty reaching the fruit on the trees. So they took a stick and tried plucking the fruit. Soon cherries started falling to the ground. POP. POP. POP. POP. POP. POP. POP. How many times did Pop occur?
